body: She moved away so they separated. This story is all kinds of bitter sweet and regrets, every detail is showing how shy and awkward she was and how she can handle sex properly now. Every flash back including the bonus pages in the tankobon are people saying how he should have did it with her.
Wait so why did they break up in the first place? And hes a virgin but shes not? Kinda sucks they didnt do it when they were dating the first time. And st the end do they say theyll start dating?
现实基调之中的一点美好吧...依然很甜
